au.com.agic.apptesting.utils

Interface ProxyManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProxyManagerImpl

    public interface ProxyManager
    A service that is used to create and configure the proxies reqyired to run a test

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ProxyDetails<?>> configureProxies(java.util.List<java.io.File> globalTempFiles, java.util.List<java.io.File> tempFiles)
      Create and configure all the proxies that are required ti run the test.
      void stopProxies(java.util.List<ProxyDetails<?>> proxies, java.lang.String reportOutput)
      Gracefully shutdown proxies before we exit the app

    • Method Detail

      • configureProxies

        java.util.List<ProxyDetails<?>> configureProxies(@NotNull
                                                 java.util.List<java.io.File> globalTempFiles,
                                                 @NotNull
                                                 java.util.List<java.io.File> tempFiles)
        Create and configure all the proxies that are required ti run the test. This can include security proxies like ZAP, request modifying proxies like BrowserMob, and configuration of external proxies.
        Parameters:
        globalTempFiles - Tempoarry files to be cleaned up once Iridium is closed
        tempFiles - Temporary files to be cleaned up after test is completed
        Returns:
        A list of proxies created

      • stopProxies

        void stopProxies(@NotNull
                 java.util.List<ProxyDetails<?>> proxies,
                 java.lang.String reportOutput)
        Gracefully shutdown proxies before we exit the app
        Parameters:
        proxies - The list of proxies that were created for this test
        reportOutput - The directory holding report output
